## Insect Counts
  
A very good year for insects flying in front of our cameras (flies, moths, daddy long-legs, etc) . excellent prey for the marauding bats and swallows. Numbers have now dropped down 'into the noise'.

```{r echo = FALSE, out.width='100%'}

library(knitr)
File_In <<- (paste(params$Data_Folder,params$Rpt_Month," ",params$Rpt_Year,"/","Chart_Category_Bar_",params$Rpt_Year,"_YTD__Insect.jpg",sep=""))

knitr::include_graphics(File_In)
```
